game.name: Etrian Odyssey HD
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아틀러스의 인기 3D 던전 RPG 시리즈 제1탄 『세계수의 미궁』이 아름답고 플레이하기 쉬운 모습으로 되살아납니다. 작은 마을 '에트리아'의 외각에서 발견된 거대한 지하 수해, '세계수의 미궁'. 플레이어는 모험가가 되어 엄청난 보물을 찾아 미궁으로 발을 내딛게 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Beyond the village of Etria lies a mysterious forest with a colossal crack opening to a puzzling labyrinth. Lead a team of explorers into the dungeon with the promise of riches, fame, and adventure!

reviewHighlights.text: One of my favorite games on the 3DS, completely disappointed in ATLUS and their PC ports, though, anky map, but to be expected of the port since it do...
An enjoyable, cute little game that is DRASTICALLY overpriced for PC. Make no mistake: this is a lightly remastered port of a decade-year old DS game,...
